name: Notion Money Manual
description: Learn how to create and sell Notion templatesA step-by-step manual to help you go from idea, to building and from launching to selling Notion templates passively.Click here to download this guideWho am I?I'm an Official Notion Ambassador and I've sold over 250,000+ templates in less than 3 years, bringing me to a total of over $275,000 generated in online income from building, launching and selling Notion templates.Why did I create this manual?Notion is the future of digital productivity for bot
features: I'm unsure about what template to create; I'm unsure of how to get ideas for templates; I don't know where to sell my templates; I don't know how to launch my template; I don't know how to get passive income; I have no followers to sell my templates to; Lesson 1: Ideas; Lesson 2: Building; Lesson 3: Pre-launch; Lesson 4: Launch
